Field Descriptions: Location of Patient when receiving Pharmacy services.  Code
identifying the place where a drug or service is dispensed or
administered.  NCPDP standard (Version B.0) renamed Patient
Location to ‘Place of Service’, however the ‘Patient Residence’ field
will be used to process the Customer Location plan edit.
Code identifying the patient’s place of
The primary prescriber’s Physician ID as indicated within the eligibility
information contained within the RxCLAIM system. If prescriber match
is found in the prescriber table, list prescriber ID.
The qualifier for the primary prescriber’s id as indicated within the
eligibility information contained within the RxCLAIM system.
